name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Results-driven Full-Stack Developer with extensive experience in **.NET**, **React**, and a strong focus on delivering high-quality, scalable web applications. Proficient in **AWS**, **Azure**, **MS SQL**, **NoSQL**, **ElasticSearch**, and deploying microservices-based architectures. Skilled in adopting modern software methodologies including **DDD**, **TDD**, **CI/CD**, and **SOLID** principles, along with implementing **IaC** using **Terraform** and container orchestration with **Docker** and **Kubernetes**. Commit to web application security and best practices while effectively communicating in English. Proven track record of driving improvements and solving complex challenges in various industries including healthcare, eCommerce, and finance through clean and efficient coding practices.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed and maintained web applications using **.NET** and **React**, ensuring adherence to **SOLID** principles and improving code maintainability.
Designed and implemented microservices architectures, contributing to the overall system scalability and efficiency, achieving **99.9%** uptime on deployed applications.
Utilized **AWS** and **Azure** cloud solutions, maximizing resource utilization and performance tuning.
Optimized database performance utilizing both **MS SQL** and **NoSQL** systems, leading to a **40%** improvement in data retrieval times.
Implemented CI/CD practices with **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and **Terraform**, reducing deployment times by **80%** and facilitating seamless transitions from development to production.
Developed RESTful services adhering to **TDD** principles, ensuring robust test coverage and software reliability, maintaining a **95%** success rate in automated tests.
Enhanced application security through **web application security** best practices, integrating authentication protocols effectively.
Utilized **ElasticSearch** for improved search capabilities, boosting query execution speed by **60%**, leading to enhanced user experience.
Collaborated in cross-functional teams to develop and refine **serverless architecture** solutions, allowing for responsive and adaptive application performance.

Utilized **.NET** and **React** to build scalable web applications, enhancing user experience and increasing engagement by **30%**.
Implemented **microservices** architecture, improving system maintainability and deployment efficiency by **40%**.
Designed and developed RESTful APIs with **Elasticsearch** for optimized search and data retrieval, reducing search latency by **15%**.
Integrated **MS SQL** and **NoSQL** databases for effective data management, enhancing query performance by **25%**.
Employed **Docker** and **Kubernetes** for containerization and orchestration, streamlining the development-to-production workflow.
Implemented **CI/CD** processes using **Azure DevOps**, resulting in faster delivery cycles and reduced rollback incidents by **20%**.
Applied **TDD** and **SOLID** principles, ensuring high code quality and test coverage of **95%** or more.
Leveraged **Terraform** for infrastructure as code (IaC) to facilitate automated environment setups, decreasing setup time by **50%**.

• Developed web applications using **.NET** and **React**, enhancing user interface performance by **40%**.
• Designed and implemented microservices architecture, ensuring robust integration with cloud solutions like **AWS** and **Azure**.
• Deployed containerized applications using **Docker** and orchestrated with **Kubernetes**, achieving a **98% uptime**.
• Implemented CI/CD pipelines and infrastructure as code (IaC) using **Terraform**, streamlining deployment processes.
• Applied test-driven development (TDD) and domain-driven design (DDD) principles, reducing bug rates by **30%**.
• Utilized **MS SQL** and **NoSQL** databases, optimizing data retrieval and ensuring efficient data management.
• Enhanced application security following web application security best practices, ensuring compliance with industry standards.
